projectGridLines.title: Project details 1 to 9 Project details given in Project Description
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1 Title: Enhancing Payments & Refund Experience to the customers


Description:

Payment & Refunds experience are very crucial from customer experience and ensuring

this is smooth is very critical for any ecommerce.

To enhance and make it more seamless improving the Success rates, new workflows and

capabilities are essential.

Skill sets: Java, Spring Boot, MYSQL, Kafka

Traits expectation: Problem Solving, Passion for Learning, Motivated

Expected learning:

? Understanding of Myntra’s Payment Ecosystem

? Working with third party systems like juspay, payu etc

? Building high performant & low latent systems

Specific courses required for project execution: Java, MYSQL, Spring Boot


Project 2 Title: Enhancing the Experience of the Wishlist [to LE / WebApp]


Description:

Currently wishlist is an App features which is more of the native, we can move it to web

based so that it can be rendered inside a webview or move to the LE version where the

support can be extended

Skill sets: React-Native, Javascript, Android/IOS

Traits expectation: Problem solving, scalability, performance optimization, higher

learning cure

Expected learning:

? understanding on how myntra LE works

? implementing the modules, rendering, React working etc.

? Building scalable and performance efficient system

? Reactive, user interactive & Functionally Efficient system


Specific courses required for project execution:

Javascript, HTML/CSS, React-Native

Project 3 Title: Extending Challenges Platform to IOS


Description:

Challenges Platform is designed to boost user engagement on Myntra by offering

personalized challenges, like encouraging users to explore products they haven't

purchased before (e.g., cross-sell), and rewarding them for it. Currently, this feature is

only available on Android, We will extend it to support the IOS.

Skill sets: React-Native, Android/IOS, Kotlin Multiplatform

Traits expectation: Problem solving, performance optimization

Expected learning:

- Hands on experience in Kotlin multiplatform, Android & IOS

- Implementing the react modules, UI rendering

- Ensuring backward compatibility, user experience

-

Specific courses required for project execution:

- Javascript, React-Native, HTML CSS

- Kotlin Multiplatform


Project 4 Title: Business metric monitoring platform


Description: Myntra has extensive tech systems monitoring. Business metric monitoring

is a pivotal part of ensuring the resiliency and consistency of the systems. We intend to

create a generic solve for Myntra on who this can achieved.

Skill sets: Not fixed on a particular technology

Traits expectation: Deep dive, problem saving, learning curiosity

Expected learning:

- Deep dive into various myntra system

- Understanding essentials of alerting & monitoring.

- Async programming.

Specific courses required for project execution:

Project 5 Title: Pegasus Platform upgradation to my new stack


Description: currently the system is very legacy and most of the operations and methods

are causing issues. This movement to the new will help upon developer productivity,

enhancing the new features, maintainability, and scalability.

Skill sets: ReactJS, javascript, HTML/CSS

Traits expectation: Problem solving, scalability, performance optimization, higher

learning cure

Expected learning:

? Experience upon the Payment Offer engine exploration

? Hands-on experience with the React, Payment platform.

? implementing the modules, rendering, React working etc.

? Building scalable and performance efficient system


? Reactive, user interactive & Functionally Efficient system


Specific courses required for project execution:

- Javascript, ReactJS , HTML CSS

Project 6 Title: PLP mweb parity with app


Description: This project aims to align the mobile web (mWeb) experience of the product

listing page with that of the app. This includes ensuring consistent design, functionality,

and performance across both platforms, enhancing user experience, and driving

engagement by providing a seamless and unified browsing experience.

Skill sets: Javascript, Typescript, React, React Native Web, Mobile Web

Traits expectation: Problem solving, performance optimization, higher learning curve

Expected learning:

? How Myntra’s search works along with various other myntra tech system

? understanding on how myntra LE works

? implementing the modules, rendering, React working etc.

? Building scalable and performance efficient system

? Reactive, user interactive & Functionally Efficient system

Specific courses required for project execution: Javascript, Typescript, React,

HTML, CSS


Project 7 Title: Autosuggest improvements


Description:

Autosuggest forms the core feature for guiding the user in experessing his/her intent in a

structured query. In this project we will look to enhance the autosuggest user experience

by doing the following:

1. improve the quality of suggestions

2. Improve the structure and type of suggestions to guide user better ( implicit/explicit

category filtering)

Skill sets: Java, Python, Machine learning, LLM and prompting, Spring boot

Traits expectation:

Problem solving, performance optimization, handons skill with data

Expected learning:

Experience with entire autosuggest eco system

Experience with searche ecosystem

Handson experience in LLM prompting and data enhancements

Specific courses required for project execution:

Java,Python, Basics of machine learning


Project 8 Title: Incorporate AR Technologies for immersive product experience


Description:

Incorporating AR technologies for product pages which can provide a more engaging,

informative, and convenient shopping experience for consumers while simultaneously

benefiting retailers in various ways.


Skill sets: Javascript, Typescript, React, React Native Web, Mobile Web, AR kit

Traits expectation: Problem Solving, Dealing with Challenges, Passion for Learning

Expected learning:

Gain knowledge of AR fundamentals, frameworks like ARKit/ARCore

Deepdive PDP services

Understand & collaborate with other Storefront services

Specific courses required for project execution: Javascript, Typescript, React,

HTML, CSS


Project 9 Title: Introduce Skin Analyser score on PDP


Description:

Enhance the PDP experience by introducing an AI-powered "Skin Matching Score"

feature. This tool, called the "Skin Analyser," will allow users to see how well the product

(e.g., makeup or skincare) matches their skin tone. The goal is to increase user

engagement and conversion rates by offering personalized product recommendations

based on the user’s skin tone.

Skill sets: Javascript, Typescript, React, React Native Web, Mobile Web, Machine

Learning

Traits expectation: Problem Solving, Dealing with Challenges, Passion for Learning

Expected learning:

Gain understanding of Computer Vision

Deepdive PDP services

Understand & collaborate with other Storefront services

Specific courses required for project execution: Javascript, Typescript, React,

HTML, CSS

projectGridLines.title: Project details from 10 to 18 Project details given in Project Description
projectGridLines.description:
Project 10 Title: Profile Page and Category page parity on mweb


Description: Building a category page out of scratch on Mweb which would help

users choose the preferred categories from the collections at Myntra. The page

should be able to house L0,L1 and L2 tiles with complete configurability of items

on the fly.

Along with this, migration and revamp of the profile page to bring to parity with

the profile page on App.

Skill sets: Javascript, Typescript, React,React-Native, HTML, CSS,

Traits expectation: Problem solving, Passion for Learning

Specific courses required for project execution: Javascript, Typescript, React,

HTML, CSS


Project 11 Modernization of pigeon service


Description: Pigeon is built out of NodeJs. We have been observing scalability and

observability issues. The idea is to move this to a microservice architecture on Java.

Skill sets: Java, Sprinboot, Cassandra

Traits expectation: Problem solving, scalability, performance optimization, higher

learning cure

Specific courses required for project execution:

- Java, Sprinboot, Cassandra


Project 12 Title: USPS Revamp


Description: There is a lot of tech debt on USPS and it also has concurrency issues that

have been identified which needs a fix. There is also a scope to improve the performance

of the service, which would reduce the hardware footprint.

Skill sets: Java, Springboot, MongoDB

Traits expectation: Good with OOPS concepts, concurrency, problem solving

Specific courses required for project execution:

OOPS concepts in Java, SpringBoot basics, MongoDB basics

Project No. Project Title & Project Description including skill sets & Expected learning:

Project 13 Title: Enhancing Release Engineering Capabilities to Achieve Faster Time to Market


Description:

In this project, engineers are supposed to enhance existing platforms with multiple

capabilities that comprise the following but are not limited to:

? Improved regression identification

? Supply Chain Vulnerability Reduction

? Benchmarking Application Performance

? Standardisation of Governance & Control Framework

? Better self-serve capabilities

Skill sets: Golang, NodeJS, ReactJS, Python, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, Cloud

Traits expectation: Problem-Solving, Passion for Learning multiple tech stacks,

Motivated

Expected learning:

? Understanding of Myntra’s Developer productivity platform

? Working with systems like Docker, Kubernetes

? Working knowledge of how an application moves from development to

production and the challenges in this flow.

Specific courses required for project execution: Golang, Kubernetes, GitHub

Actions, Azure


Project 14 Title: Enhancing the security posture of Myntra services


Description:

An ongoing project where engineers are working to improve security posture for Myntra

platforms. In this project, engineers are developing new capabilities for east-west traffic

encryption with a zero trust model, building capabilities to support DPDP Act 2023.

Skill sets: Golang, Python, Cryptography, Kerberos, Vault, PKI, Distributed Systems

Traits expectation: Problem Solving, Passion for Learning, Motivated

Expected learning:

? Understanding of Myntra’s Vault ecosystem

? Working with systems like Vault, Docker, Kubernetes

? Working knowledge of key aspects of zero trust-based systems and their use as

an identity provider


Specific courses required for project execution: Golang, Vault, Kubernetes, Azure,

server-side security, PKI infrastructure, Cryptographic algorithms


Project 15

Title:

Build & Enable Anomaly Detection Platform in Supply Chain Outbound to Address

Inventory Out-of-Stock, Non-Serviceability Patterns

Description:

The objective of this anomaly detection platform is to enhance situational awareness

within the supply chain, streamline operational efficiency, and mitigate the negative

impact of abnormal patterns or events. By automating the identification of anomalies, this

system allows organisations to focus on critical business concerns, make informed

decisions using real-time data, and respond swiftly to any detected issues.

Skill Sets:

? Good in Java or GoLang for backend development

? Familiarity with MongoDB or other NoSQL databases

? Knowledge of Stream Processing technologies for handling real-time data

? Familiarity with Docker and Kubernetes for containerization and orchestration

Traits Expectation:

Specific Courses Required for Project Execution:

? Mastery of Java or GoLang

? Expertise in MongoDB or other NoSQL databases

? Stream processing techniques for real-time applications

? Proficiency in Docker for container management

? Kubernetes for managing distributed systems at scale


Project 16

Title:

Supply Chain Operational Simulator to Test Post-Order Processing Flows

Description:

In the post-order journey, an order moves through multiple critical stages across the

warehouse and logistics facilities. These stages include order picking, item consolidation,

packing, sorting, and ultimately the delivery process, where delivery agents execute a


milk-run to hand off shipments to customers. Additionally, reverse logistics for returned

items ensures they are processed back to the warehouse for restocking.

Skill Sets:

? Proficient in Java or GoLang for robust backend development

? Experience with React and Node.js for creating dynamic, responsive UIs

? Familiarity with MongoDB or other NoSQL databases for data storage and

management

? Competence in Docker and Kubernetes for containerization and efficient

orchestration

Traits Expectation:

? Curiosity: A deep-seated interest in understanding complex systems and finding

solutions

? High Motivation & Dedication: Strong commitment to delivering high-quality

results and overcoming challenges

? Analytical Skills: Ability to analyse and interpret patterns, data, and operational

workflows to derive insights

Expected Learning:

? Comprehensive knowledge of Myntra’s supply chain processes

? In-depth understanding of order management, warehouse operations, logistics,

and CRM systems

? Hands-on experience with UI development and backend technologies

? Exposure to distributed systems architecture and strategies to tackle scaling

challenges

Specific Courses Required for Project Execution:

? Proficiency in Java or GoLang for backend development

? Expertise in React and Node.js for UI development

? Familiarity with MongoDB or other NoSQL databases

? Knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes for managing containers and

orchestration


Project 17

Title:

Attribute as a service to allow clients to add the attributes to core catalog styles.

Description:

In the Product ingestion flow, the current catalog management system allows the core

attributes to be added. These core attributes are common to all clients. However certain

clients require some specific attributes to be present for these products to handle their

specific feature asks. The aim of this project is to develop a microservice that allows

clients to add specific attributes and when the catalog management system is queried,

based on the clients, these additional attributes need to be present in the response.

Skill Sets:

? Proficient in Java for robust backend development

? Experience with React and Node.js for creating dynamic, responsive UIs

? Familiarity with Mysql databases for data storage and management


? Competence in Docker and Kubernetes for containerization and efficient

orchestration

Traits Expectation:

? Curiosity: A deep-seated interest in understanding complex systems and finding

solutions

? High Motivation & Dedication: Strong commitment to delivering high-quality

results and overcoming challenges

? Analytical Skills: Ability to analyse and interpret patterns, data, and operational

workflows to derive insights

Expected Learning:

? Comprehensive knowledge of Myntra’s Supply chain processes

? In-depth understanding of Catalog management and attribute management

systems

? Hands-on experience with UI development and backend technologies

? Exposure to distributed systems architecture and strategies to tackle scaling

challenges

Specific Courses Required for Project Execution:

? Proficiency in Java for backend development

? Expertise in React and Node.js for UI development

? Familiarity with MySql

? Knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes for managing containers and

orchestration


Project 18 Title: GenAI to improve catalog ingestion process.


Description:

Enhance the Catalog style ingestion process by introducing an AI-powered "Description”,

“Image” addition feature.. This tool will allow users to add the genai recommended

description and the attributes based on the image to the system.. The goal is to increase

the speed and accuracy.

Skill sets: Java,React,Machine Learning

Traits expectation: Problem Solving, Dealing with Challenges, Passion for Learning

Specific courses required for project execution: Java, React
